price: 66. Nabii Luutul ama caagidih, diggali tama ku maray koroositek ellecabo finqaay saaxa, num keenik raaqe kalah maaci maacisa waqdi iyyaanamah wacyi kaal oobisne.
arabic: وَقَضَيۡنَآ إِلَيۡهِ ذَٰلِكَ ٱلۡأَمۡرَ أَنَّ دَابِرَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ مَقۡطُوعٞ مُّصۡبِحِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: waqaḍaynā ilayhi dhālika al-amra anna dābira hāulāi maqṭūʿun muṣ'biḥīna
